video_prompt: Waves gently lap the changing shoreline. Sailboats traverse the sparkling sea. Clouds drift across the sky, as the crescent moon slowly fades. Water in the hot tub shimmers and ripples. Flowers sway in the breeze.
image_prompt: Vertical image: A luxurious coastal landscape featuring a white lighthouse on a rocky outcrop, a crescent moon and stars in a bright blue sky with fluffy clouds, and a sparkling blue sea with sailboats. In the foreground, a paved patio with white Adirondack chairs, a private sandy beach with an umbrella, and a circular hot tub are surrounded by lush green foliage and colorful blooming flowers, all against the backdrop of distant mountains.
refined_video_prompt: Waves gently lap the shifting shoreline. Sailboats glide across the water. Clouds drift overhead as the moon slowly diminishes. Hot tub water gently shimmers and ripples. Flowers sway with the breeze.
